page.title: 04SOUTH WEST ELECTRICITY BOARD
page.content: In our area the amount of overhead wires is about 4000m in length. The materials used for overhead wires is copper and for the underground wires the materials are copper and aluminium but it is mainly aluminium. In our area the materials used are a bit different than those used in big cities. It is called the coastal strip, the wire is made out of copper and aluminium but mainly copper. The electricity consumption in winter is a lot higher than in summer. An average consumption of a typical farm in a year is higher than an average consumption of a typical household. The places in our area which use most electricity are the farms and holiday attractions. There are not any pylons in our area.
